ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Peter van Run for technical assistance with histochemistry. We thank Debby van Riel and Thijs Kuiken for constructive discussions. This work was supported by NIH/NIAID contracts HHSN272201400008C and HHSN27220140004C. S.H. was funded in part by an NWO VIDI grant (contract number 91715372).
